content: @Ed Page Should we bump Cargo's version of toml_edit to 0.14?

We can. It will require enabling the perf feature. Later, we'll need to update rls to update toml_edit as well.

We could simplify the rls process by re-exporting the error type used by rls. At this point of thinking about it I got lazy and never bothered :)

I ask mostly because I have a project that takes a dependency on cargo and on toml_edit, and right now it can't upgrade to the new version of toml_edit since its types have to be compatible with Cargo's toml_edit types :p
